body_html:
I'm using tf.cond and also got this error:

ValueError: graph_def is invalid at node 'RNN1/cond/Assign/Switch': Input tensor 'RNN1/Variable:0' Cannot convert a tensor of type float32 to an input of type float32_ref.
body_text:
I'm using tf.cond and also got this error:
ValueError: graph_def is invalid at node 'RNN1/cond/Assign/Switch': Input tensor 'RNN1/Variable:0' Cannot convert a tensor of type float32 to an input of type float32_ref.
body:
I'm using `tf.cond` and also got this error:

```ValueError: graph_def is invalid at node 'RNN1/cond/Assign/Switch': Input tensor 'RNN1/Variable:0' Cannot convert a tensor of type float32 to an input of type float32_ref.```
